name: A Turbo Fish
description:
Turbo Fish is on a mission - help him to shoot, dodge and fight the enemies of the ocean while collecting coins. Or throw your fish out of water and play as Rocket Mouse instead! Collect power ups to destroy all enemies and collect all coins at once.

Endless gameplay with new characters to play with once you collect a certain amount of coins.

Players will have to battle the creatures of the sea in this fishy game adventure!
